original: Hallagård, Gustaf Albert, hemm’ans-ägare, riksdagsman, Slutarp., f. 24/ 4/87 i Kinneved, Skarab. k G. 16 m. The-a Tohanson,. Barn: Elly f. 16, Gillis 20, Rune 24. — Folkhög-sk. 05-06, lantm:sk. lO-lL Äg. fäder-neg. Hallagården. Led. av riksd. andra kamm. 18-43, första fr. 44, statsrev. 33 o. 34, led. av bf :s förtr :råd, landstingsman fr. 19, led. av Skara stifts-nd fr. 36, ordf. i Kinneveds pens :nd fr. 14, i valnd, i Falköp. kretsavd. av Skarab. k hush :sällsk., v. ordf. i kyrkor., led. av hush:säilsk. fÖTvaltn:-utsk. fr. 34, led. av ägodeln :rät’t fr. 26. Rev. i A-B Sv. Tob :monop. fr. 43. KV02kl, RNO.
translated: Hallagård, Gustaf Albert, homestead owner, parliamentarian, Slutarp., b. 24/4/87 in Kinneved, Skaraborg County. Married Thea Tohanson in 1903. Children: Elly b. 1916, Gillis b. 1920, Rune b. 1924. Attended folk high school in 1905-1906 and agricultural school in 1910-1911. Owns the ancestral farm Hallagården. Was a member of parliament in the second chamber from 1918-1943, then in the first chamber from 1944. Also served as state auditor in 1933 and 1934, member of the Board of Agriculture's executive council, county council member starting in 1919, member of the Skara diocese council starting in 1936, chairman of the Kinneved pension fund since 1914, member of the Falköping district section of the Skaraborg County Agricultural Society, vice-chairman of the church council, member of the society's management committee since 1934, and member of the property rights committee since 1926. Was a board member of the Swedish Tobacco Monopoly from 1943. Knight of the Order of the North Star (KV02kl) and Commander of the Royal Order of the Seraphim (RNO).

memberOf.name: Falköping district section of the Skaraborg County Agricultural Society
